      • remapAxes

        public static void remapAxes​(com.qualcomm.hardware.bosch.BNO055IMU imu,
                             org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.AxesOrder order,
                             AxesSigns signs)
        Remap BNO055 IMU axes and signs. For reference, the default order is AxesOrder.ZYX. Call after BNO055IMU.initialize(BNO055IMU.Parameters). Adapted from this post.
        Parameters:
        imu - IMU
        order - axes order
        signs - axes signs
